channel.title: Tachyon on Tachyon Research
channel.description: Recent content in Tachyon on Tachyon Research

item.title: About us
item.description: About Tachyon Tachyon Research Ltd. is a high-speed growth quantitative trading company of its own funds and mainly manages the general manager’s family and the company’s assets. The members of the company come from big nine investment banks, big four accounting firm, head brokers in China and top universities overseas. 100% of the company’s employees are having master’s degrees and above. We have 13 self-owned quantitative trading models, and issue independent research reports on major types of assets every month.
